data.title: Husam Helmi Alharahsheh
data.meta_description: Husam Helmi Alharahsheh is an experienced senior academic with an extensive experience of teaching, supervision and research within higher education...
data.text: Husam Helmi Alharahsheh is an experienced senior academic with an extensive experience of teaching, supervision and research within higher education context. His higher education qualification at the undergraduate and postgraduate levels were focused on the fields of business management and higher education management. He is an active contributor to the development of process of wide range of higher education courses at the undergraduate and postgraduate levels in the fields of business, hospitality and education management. He has excellent experience in academic management and leadership within UK higher education institutions. He is also a visiting academic across various universities as well as other academic institutions based in the UK and abroad. His academic and professional experience is developed through working across a wide number of UK based higher education institutions within the public, private as well as not for profit sectors. He has developed links with external networks within the industry to maintain understanding of the key trends and challenges that can be proactively and reactively researched and implemented within curriculum. His contributions in UK and abroad are giving him the opportunity to have further global exposure and understanding of key trends within various sectors. His key research interest are mainly in employability enhancement, internationalization, Globalization, sustainability, Education and enhancement of curriculum at various levels within higher education. His research is communicated nationally and internationally in the form of academic papers and books/book chapters published through highly reputable international academic journals and publishers. He is also actively contributing to enhancement of research quality published through acting as an executive editor of the Global Academic Journal of Economics and Business, associate editor of East African Journal of Economics, Business and Management, and Cross Current International Journal of Economics, Management and Media Studies. Furthermore, He has varied contributions to a wide number of international academic journals as a reviewer including but not limited to the Journal of Media Management and Entrepreneurship (JMME), International Journal of Responsible Leadership and Ethical Decision-Making (IJRLEDM), International Journal of Marketing and Sales Education (IJMSE), Saudi Journal of Business and Management Studies (SJBMS), International Journal of Teacher Education and Professional Development (IJTEPD), International Journal of Sustainable Entrepreneurship and Corporate Social Responsibility (IJSECSR), and International Journal of Tourism and Hospitality Management in the Digital Age (IJTHMDA).
